column4: why does my computer take for ever to open anything online? Yesterday it was running fairly fast.
kill any torrents that are active on your network?  That's my first suspicion
let me check it out, thanks

You can compress a file without packaging multiple files together, and you can archive files together without compressing them.  In windows terms, zip files usually do both, but the 'store' compression method just does the archiving without compressing
